category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECTCNRevisionDetailsProperties
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of properties to be compared on revisions in a Change Notice folder when searching by Change Notice in the Change Tracker. If the values are different, the property is listed in the Change Tracker Details panel. In the Change Tracker Details panel, properties of child lines are also compared. Valid values are internal names of Item Revision properties.
